programme.title: Cerita Raya Luar Biasa
programme.desc: Wany dan Ismail balik ke kampung untuk beraya dengan abang Andi. Keesokan harinya, mereka terjaga dan tersadai di pulau asing. Mereka melalui pelbagai insiden yang aneh untuk pulang ke rumah atuk mereka.

programme.title: Tersuka Tanpa Sengaja - EP 1
programme.desc: Perkahwinan Syed Arif dan Farhah tanpa bersulam cinta mengundang pelbagai konflik. Ketika hubungan mula serasi, Syed Arif bertemu semula dengan kekasih lamanya, Katrina yang rupanya adik kepada Farhah.

programme.title: Raja Lubuk - EP 5

programme.title: Bro Jenin
programme.desc: Kisah Jenin yang telah masuk ke zaman kini. Dia berjumpa dengan seorang animator, Emily. Wujud perbezaan pendapat maka terjadi lah kisah2 lucu dan akhirnya Jenin terpaksa pulang ke tempat asalnya.

programme.title: Renovate - EP 6
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Daiyan Trisha, dia akan mencari rumah yang asalnya biasa atau lama tetapi telah diubahsuai menjadi cantik dengan bantuan arkitek yang berpengalaman.

programme.title: The Lucky Bini Show - EP 11

programme.title: Beriyani Gam Kak Aspalela - EP 1

Finally, his father invests his entire savings in one of his directorial ventures and dies of a heart break when that film flops as well.

Since he doesn't reappear and her mother gives only evasive replies, the teenager begins to fear the worst...

programme.title: Le Mobilier
programme.desc: A gallery specialising in contemporary art organises a preview presenting a range of different artistic performances. Iliadia, the cleaner, can't understand the point of it and is irritated by the behaviour of certain visitors.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: Objectif Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: Four national languages, as many cultural regions, twenty cantons: how did Switzerland manage to build a nation and have such a high GDP? How does the country face climate change? And why does it allow assisted suicide and is about to legalize the sale of cannabis?

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 4
programme.desc: Suffering from dystonia after catching malaria in Angola, Orvedi Claudio learnt to deal with a difficult body. Helped by his mother, who wanted to give him a better future, he came to France. Now studying at the prestigious Henri IVcollege, he is cultivating his passion for literature.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Normandie Ne Partira Pas Ce Soir
programme.desc: It was the world's largest, most beautiful and fastest cruise ship. Built in Saint Nazaire in 1932, the ''Normandie'' was the pride of France. But it took only a few hours, amidst the chaos of World War Two, for this dream of grandeur to lie broken in New York harbour.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Ce Qui A Ete Et Ce Qui Restera...
programme.desc: For the last fifteen years, Thomas Fisch has travelled the Sahel and northern Niger in search of the Wodaabe Fula. Renowned for their cattle herds, the migrations of this nomadic people depend on the vagaries of weather and politics. Today some prefer to settle, whilst others maintain their traditional values.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 10
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Au Nom De Nos Ancetres, Esclaves Et Negociants
programme.desc: Aurelie Bambuck and Axelle Balguerie share the same history: their ancestors participated in the transatlantic slave trade. One is the descendent of slaves while the other is the heiress of traders. The two women face up to their past and lay the foundations of an appeased memory. Encounter.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Rallye Monte-Carlo Historique 2025
programme.desc: A look back at the 27th edition of the Historical Monte-Carlo Rally, which took place between 29 January and 5 February 2025, a competition reserved for cars that took part in previous editions of the Monte-Carlo Automobile Rally.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 9
programme.desc: Twice a year, the equinoxes create exceptional tidal ranges that draw impressive crowds. Particularly popular, Saint Malo is home to the world's most impressive tides, and all the more so during the equinoxes. To better understand the phenomenon, Sophie Ladame meets geologist Odile Guerin under the full moon.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1576
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 2
programme.desc: Julien joins Vale and Alex, the nomadic pair behind the YouTube channel Prets pour la Route, ready to head off and discover Grand Manan Island. We discover their lives as content creators living in their 7m caravan.

programme.title: Quand L'afrique Sauva La France
programme.desc: 1940. When de Gaulle called on the French to join him he hardly imagined that he would be leading the struggle to liberate France from the heart of black Africa. Brazzaville became the capital of Free France. In these mobilised colonies, an immense desire for independence was coming to life.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 25
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 13
programme.desc: Emmanuel Renaut is a competitor at heart: a three-star chef and Meilleur Ouvrier de France, this workaholic never stops. From the Aiguille du Midi in Haute-Savoie to the Vallee de Joux in Switzerland, via Megeve and Chamonix, we'll be tasting his mountain cuisine with him.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 2
programme.desc: Julien joins Vale and Alex, the nomadic pair behind the YouTube channel Prets pour la Route, ready to head off and discover Grand Manan Island. We discover their lives as content creators living in their 7m caravan.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 9
programme.desc: Twice a year, the equinoxes create exceptional tidal ranges that draw impressive crowds. Particularly popular, Saint Malo is home to the world's most impressive tides, and all the more so during the equinoxes. To better understand the phenomenon, Sophie Ladame meets geologist Odile Guerin under the full moon.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 35
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 49
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 3
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 9
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 42
programme.desc: Alix would really love to feature in the story Big Boss is busy writing. Whilst she's trying to think what she could do that would be worth writing about, Hatter and Hare are making one blunder after another.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 13
programme.desc: Emmanuel Renaut is a competitor at heart: a three-star chef and Meilleur Ouvrier de France, this workaholic never stops. From the Aiguille du Midi in Haute-Savoie to the Vallee de Joux in Switzerland, via Megeve and Chamonix, we'll be tasting his mountain cuisine with him.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 26
programme.desc: October 1995. The body of 26 year-old student Sebastien Faisant is discovered in a field in Montagnat, Rhone-Alpes. The only clue for the police: a few days earlier he had used the ''Minitel Rose'', an erotic chat service, to contact a libertine couple. Gradually, the investigators discovered a demonic duo.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 10
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Le Voile Bleu
programme.desc: After losing her husband and baby during World War I, Louise decides to devote her life to caring for the children of others as nanny and governess. Many years later, thanks to one of these children, she meets up again with all the children she raised over a Christmas meal.

programme.title: Movie - Sura
programme.desc: When Samuthira Raja, a corrupt politician, tries to seize the villagers' land, Sura, a brave and powerful fisherman, sets out to fight against him.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Nalla Naal Parthu Soldren
programme.desc: A tribal man, bound by tradition, arrives in the city to kidnap his betrothed. He incidentally also meets the girl's lover who, after realising his intentions, sets out to rescue her.

programme.title: Movie - Nattai Thirudathe
programme.desc: This movie stars Janakaraj, Sumitra and Y G Mahendran, and is directed by Senthilnathan.

programme.title: Movie - Neer Nilam Neruppu
programme.desc: Chellama makes her sister marry her husband Kuppan after she is unable to conceive. Soon, they are blessed with a child. Kuppan is then smitten with Rajathi, jeopardising the lives of his two wives.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sri Rama Rajiyam
programme.desc: Rama, the son of king Dhasaratha, moves out of his kingdom with his wife Sita and brother Laxmana to live in the forest for 14 years. Ravana, the king of Lanka, kidnaps Sita. Rama defeats him in a war and gets back Sita.

programme.title: Movie - Thanga Magan (New)
programme.desc: Tamizh leads a peaceful life. He has a good job and a loving wife, but everything is shattered when his father commits suicide. He tries to uncover the reason that prompted his father to kill himself.

programme.title: Movie - Kushi
programme.desc: College friends Jenny and Shiva part ways due to a misunderstanding. Despite being in love and realising that they cannot live without each other, their egos prevent them from uniting.

programme.title: Movie - 96
programme.desc: K Ramachandran, a photographer, gets nostalgic after he visits his school in his hometown. During a reunion with his classmates, he meets Janaki, his childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Movie - Dev
programme.desc: Dev, an adventure-loving young man, often embarks on escapades with his best friend Vicky. His life takes a turn when Vicky tries to set him up with Meghna, a USA-based businesswoman.

programme.title: Movie - February 14
programme.desc: Shiva falls in love with Pooja, a girl raised in the US, who is in India visiting her grandparents. When she wants to return to the US, he creates a fictitious character to impress her.

programme.title: Movie - Nenjathai Killadhae
programme.desc: Aanandi meets Vasan who likes experimenting with life's various situations. They challenge each other for another experiment during which she actually falls in love with him. But Vasan rejects her.

programme.title: Movie - Neruppukul Eeram
programme.desc: Police officer Karthik is hell-bent on putting Baba, a local goon, behind bars. However, Karthik's fiancee Radha asks him to forgive Baba by giving him a chance to reform himself.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Veadha
programme.desc: Two brothers are in love with the same girl. The elder brother, who the girl is in love with, convinces her to marry his brother. But on the day of the wedding, a shocking truth comes out and it changes their lives from there on.

programme.title: Movie - Adharmam
programme.desc: Dharma is a sandalwood smuggler who plants a sapling for every tree he chops. After his death, his brother Arjuna handles the business and asserts that the state is responsible for the rise in crime.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Oorille Oru Rajakumari
programme.desc: After being mistreated by his family for being unemployed, a youth decides to get married only to a princess but eventually falls for a poor girl. The girl is actually a princess and is in search of a man who will love her for her and not her riches.

programme.title: Movie - Vanna Thamizh Pattu
programme.desc: The village head is amazed at the singing talent of their new servant. A girl in the family falls in love with the servant. The truth is revealed that he is married to the village head's daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Kannu Pada Pokuthaiya
programme.desc: Vetrivel, a respected man, dearly loves his brother and sacrifices his love for him. Problems arise when his brother, Subramaniyam, starts suspecting him of having an affair with his wife Gowri.

programme.title: ASO Sailing Programming 2024
programme.desc: The Vende Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The skippers set off from Les Sables-d'Olonne in Vende and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables d'Olonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Charleston Open is a WTA Tour affiliated professional tennis tournament for women, held every year since 1973. It is the oldest professional all-women's tournament in America with a $888,636 purse. The tournament is played on the green clay courts at LTP-Daniel Island (which contains the 10,200-seat Credit One Stadium) on Daniel Island in Charleston, South Carolina, US.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2024

From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: ASO Marathon Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Barcelona Marathon is an annual marathon held in March in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, and first held in 1978 in Palafrugell, Catalonia. programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025

It is often called the "fifth Grand Slam" in reference to this.

programme.desc: Chelsea have lost just one of their last 12 Premier League games against Spurs (W9 D2), winning the last three in a row by an aggregate score of 10-4.

programme.desc: Manchester City have won nine of their last 10 Premier League games against Leicester, winning the last six in a row by an aggregate score of 15-4.

programme.desc: Bournemouth have picked up 23 away Premier League points in 2024-25, their most in a top-flight campaign, while their 30 goals are also their most on the road.

programme.desc: Following their 3-1 win at the Amex Stadium in December, Crystal Palace are looking to complete their first league double over Brighton since 1932-33 (Third Division South), and for the first time ever in the top-flight.

programme.title: WCCB Live Janibek Alimkhanuly vs. Anauel Ngamissengue
programme.desc: LIVE April 5th, undefeated WBO and IBF Middleweight World Champion Janibek Alimkhanuly will look to defend his titles in his home country of Kazakhstan when he faces fellow undefeated middleweight Anauel Ngamissengue of France. Both fighters bring substantial power into the contest, with Janibek having won nine of his last ten bouts by stoppage, and Ngamissengue stopping six of his last seven.

programme.title: WCCB Live Tina Rupprecht vs. Sumire Yamanaka
programme.desc: LIVE April 5th from the MBS Arena in Potsdam, Germany, two World Champions meet to unify the titles when WBC and WBO Atomweight Champion Tina Rupprecht takes on undefeated IBF titleholder Sumire Yamanaka of Japan. Rupprecht, looking to add the IBF title to her collection, has held the WBC title for over six years, and added the WBO version in November by defeating Eri Matsuda.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Tshilumba Mikixi vs. August Kayambala
programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light heavyweights Andre 'S.O.G.' Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Ricky Hatton
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr., in the final bout before his first retirement from boxing, facing Ricky Hatton in a superfight. Mayweather has referred to Hatton as one of the toughest competitors he has ever had to face. Also on the card, a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez continues to rise in the rankings.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4, from the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, features Tokushoryu, Yutakayama, Asanoyama and Shodai.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Todd Foster
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (47-3-0 21 KO) faces Todd Foster (33-3-0 29 KO) in a 12-round contest for the vacant IBC Welterweight Title from Atlantic City New Jersey USA.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Tshilumba Mikixi vs. August Kayambala
programme.desc: In this episode Tshilomba 'The Old Monkey' Mikixi takes on August 'The Barista' Kayambala in a lightweight clash.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 4
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 35
programme.desc: When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 102
programme.desc: Po eats Tubby Custard and gets a messy bib. Po washes the bib clean and hangs it out to dry before eating more Tubby Custard with Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about the wonders of Tubby Custard and Toast.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: The friends come together to plan a secret surprise for Fly. However, as Hooper and Fly find out there's a big secret, they try to use their super-spy plan to discover what the surprise is.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Dog and Pug join Granny Pug in search of the Lesser-Spotted Kraken.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: When Messy and his friends go camping with a robot who can do anything, there is a giant-sized sock accident!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Messy's tummy is rumbling and so is Lofty the giant's! Luckily the gang are hungry to solve this scientific mystery.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 57
programme.desc: Monty has reservations about attending a sleepover when he realises he will be away from Jimmy Jones. He soon decides it could be good for him and Jimmy to be apart for a while.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 33
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are getting ready for a Halloween party, but when JoJo accidentally squashes their spooky pumpkin lantern, they need a replacement! Luckily Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran join Jaxon and Ezra in the park for Cynthia's pirate-themed treasure hunt. Who will be the first to find the treasure? Come on, shipmates, and set sail with JoJo and Gran Gran!

programme.desc: When Sarah and Duck are racing paper planes, they chance upon an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Scarf Lady needs some inspiration so Sarah takes her to the Hat Museum.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 11
programme.desc: Sonny returns to Sodor to try to be a really useful engine again but some of the other trains aren't willing to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: In the perilous plant aisle Supertato and Evil Pea team up to find treasure as they have half a map each, but she tricks him and steals the map to find the treasure for herself.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year - and hes also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nians cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but theyre no match.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets people in Kenya, Switzerland and the US who are working to remove the three big hurdles between us and a true transportation revolution.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau visits Germany where a port is working on the ultimate sustainable solution, and travels to Kenya and Greenland to learn how art and living in harmony can help humans.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: In Texas, a former preacher exploited the trust of his peers under a cloak of religious virtue. This is the intimate story of those whose lives were destroyed by his $38 million dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S4 - EP 1
programme.desc: How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear. Two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Poisoning the Amazon. Aluminium in Ford's new electric F-150 can be traced back to bauxite mines in the Amazon whose owners have long faced allegations of pollution and land appropriation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of Neuro-Insight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Liquid Death was founded on the idea of breaking the norms of traditional marketing. We speak to CMO Dan Murphy about the water company's origin as a "sheep in wolf's clothing."

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.desc: Whistleblowers Warn About the Dark Side of AI. Emily is joined by Ifeoma Ozoma, Timnit Gebru, and Safiya Noble, who have raised the alarm on Big Tech's growing influence in our daily lives.

programme.title: The Circuit S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Emily sits down with Angel City FC's founders: Natalie Portman, Kara Nortman, and Julie Uhrman. Now in its second season, the team is changing the culture of professional sports.

programme.title: The Circuit S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Inside Silicon Valley's Famous Startup School. Chang also gets a behind-the-scenes look at Tan's at-home YouTube studio, where he makes content for entrepreneurs.

programme.title: The Circuit S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily sits down with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to hear about how AI is shaking up the competition for search.

programme.title: The Circuit S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily heads to LA to meet the TikTok famous D'Amelio family. They discuss their expansion into television, investing, and building their own brand.

programme.title: How India's Narendra Modi Took Power
programme.desc: Narendra Modi, India's prime minister, is both highly popular and deeply polarizing. How did he get to the top of Indian politics, and what do his policies mean for the country's future?

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ryan Kaji is the reigning king of toy videos and one of YouTube's biggest and highest-paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents on the set of his new movie for a look at the young influencer's next act.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the world's biggest streamer.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with Premier Lacrosse League Founder and President Paul Rabil about how he launched the PLL and what's next for the nascent league.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with David Rubenstein, co-founder of The Carlyle Group, about his recent purchase of the Baltimore Orioles and what the team means for the city.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Carolyn Tisch Blodgett. Alex and Jason sit with Gotham FC owner Carolyn Tisch Blodgett to discuss investing in women's sports, start-up marketing and lessons from the NY Giants.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with TikTok star and founder of CrossCheck Studios Josh Richards about audience development and how sports teams should leverage social media.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of Neuro-Insight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Liquid Death was founded on the idea of breaking the norms of traditional marketing. We speak to CMO Dan Murphy about the water company's origin as a "sheep in wolf's clothing."

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Tough Trains

programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Founder Stories
programme.desc: Success stories of founders of start-up businesses. Stories from what sparked the idea, the obstacles they went through, to the results that benefit many people.

programme.title: Meet The Creators S3
programme.desc: Meet the Creators will take you to see the journey of local works and businesses in Indonesia.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Travel Note S3
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: Negeri 5 Menara
programme.desc: Six best friends in the Islamic Boarding School often hang out near the mosque towers. All of them made a promise under the tower that one day, they will go to places that they have been dreaming about.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S2
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcaster's work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the regions top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the worlds most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xins very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Raised in Hiroshima, Fought in Vietnam: A Japanese American Who Spent 80 Years A
programme.desc: Takeshi Furumoto, was born as a Japanese American in a Relocation Center during World War II. He was raised in Hiroshima aftermath of the atomic bombing, and later he fought in the Vietnam War driven by the desire to be recognized as an American. This documentary traces Furumoto's 80-year journey, recounting the hardships he faced as he was torn between Japan and the United States, living as both a victim and a combatant during two wars.

programme.title: ETV Special "Kalakasan: Empowering Filipino Women in Japan"
programme.desc: Kalakasan is the Tagalog word for Power and the name of an empowerment center for Filipinos women who are living in Japan. The center has provided consultation for those who have troubles, such as issues with their Japanese husband, works, sickness and finances. This program sheds light on the issues currently faced by Filipino women who came to Japan during the migrant worker boom of the 1980s and have chosen to live their lives here.

programme.desc: An easy-to-do exercise program for everyone from children to the elderly.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Mars Taught Us What is Critical (R)
programme.desc: Featuring distinguished programs ranging from entertainment shows to documentaries.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Happiness Comes from Eating, Sleeping and Waiting" Eps. 1New (R)
programme.desc: A 38 years-old single woman Mugimaki Satokos life has completely changed after being diagnosed with a "lifelong" illness. She is forced to quit her job and finds an old housing complex with a monthly rent of 50,000 yen. With her landlord living next door and a sketchy cook, Satoko encounters "medicinal cuisine," a way of eating seasonal food to maintain bodily functions. A story that will warm you from the bottom of your stomach, just like a bowl of rice porridge, is about to begin!

programme.title: Songs for Everyone
programme.desc: A song program where children can sing along by reading the lyrics on the screen.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: Information Worth Knowing from the News Commentator Bureau
programme.desc: The commentators present trending news, its background, and engaging information related to daily life in an easy-to -understand manner.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Come Come Everybody" Encore Eps. 96
programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Eps. 6 (R)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: News Around Japan
programme.desc: Program introduces the latest news from all over Japan.

programme.title: World Music Album
programme.desc: A 5-minute music program introducing classical music.

programme.title: My Gardening
programme.desc: Learn useful tips on gardening.

programme.title: Kyoto's Hidamariya Garden Shop
programme.desc: Offering tips on growing flowers and greens through an animated short story.

programme.title: Points at Issue
programme.desc: Specialists from different fields will make commentaries on current event issues.

programme.title: The Fountain of Ancient Wisdom "Yanase Takashi" (R)
programme.desc: The challenges we face today are similar to what our forerunners went through. The program searches for clues to solve problems, utilizing the wisdoms of historical figures.

programme.title: Exploring Factories (R)
programme.desc: An entertainment program visiting small and large factories to discover the latest science, hidden artisanship, and enthusiastic people that support traditions of Japanese manufacture.

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.title: Fun with Japanese
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a word as a theme, exploring its meaning and history while discovering the charm of Japanese language. The program also features dance performances of quotes from the worlds great figures, visits schools to interact with children, and introduces classical performing arts and songs, making it enjoyable for both children and adults.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Lets learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.desc: The challenges we face today are similar to what our forerunners went through. The program searches for clues to solve problems, utilizing the wisdoms of historical figures.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "I'm A Frank-Mannered Woman" Encore Eps. 5
programme.desc: Amihama Nami (Maruyama Rei), a self-described "frank-mannered" woman, works at a publishing company. She is self-centered, never reflects on herself, and is a new kind of dark heroine who overcomes any difficulties with her amazing high self-esteem and positive thinking! This is a sympathetic comedy about her, who says what she thinks without hesitation, and adults who, in contrast to her, have common sense. By the end, youll love to her!

programme.title: The Winning Meals of Great Historical Figures (New)
programme.desc: What kind of meals did the great generals and people who made their marks on history eat? Comedy trio Neptune recreates the dishes with experts, exploring the lifestyle and philosophies of great historical figures of the past and present. In addition, the comedy skits by Neptune are a must-see!

programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Warm on A Cold Night - EP 4
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 4
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 17
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1922
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 594
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 24
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 32

programme.title: Moonlight Mystique - EP 1
programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1923
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 37
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 38
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 2
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 8
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 8
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FUs real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 6
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Man In Charge - EP 3
programme.desc: Master TAI YAU KUNG (Lau Ka Fai) is skilled in training official advisor for government. He helps his foster son CHOW PING (Ma Kwok Ming) obtain a job in officialdom. PING is a resourceful young man but he holds fast to his own beliefs. He finds all the rules and practices of the officials intolerable so he stays idle all the time. Sometimes he goes tavern to have fun and he falls into the adorable owner CHONG SIU HAN (Leila Tong).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 9
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 10
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FUs real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 11
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry.
